topic: Model A benchmark claims conflict across three labs
task: Reconcile score discrepancies and identify likely measurement bias
continuationCriteria: at least two independent replications converge on a confidence band
stopCriteria: all evidence traces back to one vendor controlled benchmark

topic: Open source agent framework reliability reports diverge
task: Compare evaluation protocols and failure definitions
continuationCriteria: protocol normalized comparison shows actionable signal
stopCriteria: methodology mismatch makes direct comparison invalid

topic: Inference latency claims vary by region and provider
task: Separate network effects from model runtime effects
continuationCriteria: region adjusted latency profile is consistent
stopCriteria: measurement sources are unverifiable

topic: Tool calling accuracy differs between blog and field reports
task: Map each report to task difficulty and tooling setup
continuationCriteria: accuracy split by task class explains most variance
stopCriteria: sample sizes remain too small for directional confidence

topic: Safety incident frequencies are reported inconsistently
task: Normalize incident taxonomies and count windows
continuationCriteria: taxonomy aligned trendline is stable across sources
stopCriteria: incident definitions cannot be harmonized

topic: Viral post claims 10x productivity gains from a new workflow
task: Locate primary data and separate anecdote from measured effect
continuationCriteria: at least one controlled before after dataset exists
stopCriteria: only testimonial evidence is available

topic: Popular thread says autonomous agents remove need for PM review
task: Assess failure modes that still require human checkpoints
continuationCriteria: clear boundary for safe autonomy is identified
stopCriteria: no reproducible examples exceed baseline with acceptable risk

topic: Creator claims low code stack can replace bespoke integrations
task: Evaluate hidden maintenance costs and integration debt
continuationCriteria: cost model includes 90 day maintenance projection
stopCriteria: cost assumptions are opaque or circular

topic: Announcement says enterprise grade security by default
task: Extract concrete controls and validate against threat scenarios
continuationCriteria: control mapping closes top three realistic threats
stopCriteria: controls are marketing claims without implementation detail

topic: Community trend suggests model X is now best for research synthesis
task: Compare synthesis quality on heterogeneous source sets
continuationCriteria: model advantage holds across at least three domains
stopCriteria: wins only appear on narrow prompt templates

topic: Weekly frontier model launch stream
task: Track what changed in reasoning, tools, and cost profile
continuationCriteria: change log contains user relevant deltas
stopCriteria: release notes are cosmetic with no practical impact

topic: New SDK versions introduce breaking behavior
task: Identify migration risk and rollback options
continuationCriteria: breaking points are testable in a staging harness
stopCriteria: version notes are incomplete and no reproducible breakage

topic: Provider policy updates alter throughput limits
task: Quantify impact on current research workflow cadence
continuationCriteria: updated throughput model predicts backlog impact
stopCriteria: policy text lacks enforceable details

topic: Model deprecations announced with short windows
task: Prioritize migration path for active automations
continuationCriteria: critical paths have validated replacement models
stopCriteria: replacement path regresses key outputs beyond tolerance

topic: Prompting feature release claims better long context handling
task: Test context retention on multi hop research prompts
continuationCriteria: retention improves on fixed benchmark prompts
stopCriteria: improvement disappears under realistic prompt noise

topic: New connector requests broad workspace permissions
task: Map minimum permission set for research use only
continuationCriteria: least privilege configuration is documented and tested
stopCriteria: connector cannot function without excessive permissions

topic: Agent memory persistence expands by default
task: Assess data retention and accidental sensitive capture risk
continuationCriteria: retention guardrails enforce low sensitivity scope
stopCriteria: retention cannot be bounded by policy

topic: Third party enrichment API added to research pipeline
task: Evaluate outbound data exposure surface
continuationCriteria: outbound payload redaction prevents sensitive leakage
stopCriteria: required fields include high sensitivity identifiers

topic: Browser automation extension added for source extraction
task: Review execution boundaries and prompt injection resistance
continuationCriteria: sandbox and allowlist controls block hostile actions
stopCriteria: untrusted page content can trigger unrestricted actions

topic: Cross channel posting automation expanded
task: Verify publication gating and final review enforcement
continuationCriteria: all outbound channels require final reviewer confirmation
stopCriteria: any path allows autonomous publish without human gate

topic: Model switch promises lower cost with similar quality
task: Estimate quality adjusted cost per accepted insight
continuationCriteria: lower cost holds without quality regression
stopCriteria: quality drop exceeds acceptable threshold

topic: High context model increases spend during peak monitoring
task: Find tiered routing policy by task complexity
continuationCriteria: routing reduces spend while preserving critical task quality
stopCriteria: routing complexity causes operational instability

topic: Parallel deep dives increase latency variance
task: Optimize worker fanout and merge strategy
continuationCriteria: p95 latency improves with no major coverage loss
stopCriteria: coverage loss removes key contrarian signals

topic: Frequent reruns for noisy sources drive token waste
task: Design dedupe and freshness windows
continuationCriteria: token usage drops while missed updates remain low
stopCriteria: freshness windows miss meaningful breaking updates

topic: Image and video heavy sources are expensive to process
task: Set media triage policy before full analysis
continuationCriteria: triage catches high value media without full ingestion
stopCriteria: triage misses repeatedly correlate with missed insights

topic: Potential product pivot opportunity from new model capability
task: Determine whether to run a focused validation sprint
continuationCriteria: evidence supports a clear upside with bounded downside
stopCriteria: benefit depends on speculative assumptions

topic: Competitor launched AI workflow similar to our roadmap
task: Assess urgency to accelerate or differentiate
continuationCriteria: decision memo recommends one path with evidence
stopCriteria: signal is too noisy to justify roadmap disruption

topic: Regulatory signal may affect data handling in 90 days
task: Define immediate no regret controls
continuationCriteria: short list of controls reduces risk materially
stopCriteria: regulatory interpretations remain too uncertain

topic: Provider reliability incidents increased this month
task: Decide if multi provider fallback should be accelerated
continuationCriteria: incident trend exceeds predefined tolerance
stopCriteria: incidents are isolated and non recurring

topic: Research backlog is growing faster than review bandwidth
task: Recommend triage policy changes for executive signal first
continuationCriteria: policy increases decision ready output ratio
stopCriteria: policy reduces context needed for high stakes calls

topic: Model alignment research opens three plausible threads
task: Propose branch tasks for policy, capability, and adoption implications
continuationCriteria: branches are independent and testable in one week
stopCriteria: branches overlap heavily with no unique signal

topic: Source corpus reveals conflicting market narratives
task: Split into bullish, neutral, and bearish evidence tracks
continuationCriteria: each track has explicit falsification criteria
stopCriteria: tracks reuse same evidence without differentiation

topic: Security findings suggest both technical and governance gaps
task: Create separate remediation streams and dependencies
continuationCriteria: streams can execute in parallel with clear owners
stopCriteria: dependencies block parallel execution entirely

topic: Cost analysis indicates quick wins and structural fixes
task: Branch into immediate tuning versus architecture changes
continuationCriteria: quick wins fund longer term work without rework
stopCriteria: quick wins conflict with long term architecture direction

topic: New channel opportunities emerge from community signals
task: Generate branch plans for launch experiment, partnership, and content strategy
continuationCriteria: branch plans define success and failure metrics
stopCriteria: none of the branches has measurable outcomes

topic: Quarterly watchlist for model safety regressions
task: Track recurring indicators and threshold breaches
continuationCriteria: trendline shows directional movement over multiple cycles
stopCriteria: indicator definitions drift and break comparability

topic: Monthly tooling ecosystem consolidation tracker
task: Monitor vendor exits, acquisitions, and migration pressure
continuationCriteria: consolidation signals alter platform risk profile
stopCriteria: events are isolated and non systemic

topic: Research quality drift over long context workloads
task: Observe summary fidelity and critical reasoning retention
continuationCriteria: drift detected with reproducible benchmark decline
stopCriteria: variance remains within expected noise band

topic: Community sentiment around autonomous research agents
task: Separate novelty hype from durable adoption indicators
continuationCriteria: adoption indicators persist for at least three periods
stopCriteria: engagement spikes decay without workflow retention

topic: Provider pricing behavior over time
task: Track sustained changes to unit economics and contract risk
continuationCriteria: pricing trend impacts roadmap level budget decisions
stopCriteria: changes are short lived promotional noise
